author: Theresa Avila
title: Donald Trump’s Retweet Was Supposed to Praise Ivanka Trump, But It Tagged the Wrong User
text: To say that Donald Trump uses Twitter is — of course — an understatement. It’s his preferred medium of communication these days for unleashing his rage on anything from SNL to civil rights heroes . The man is also quite the fan of the retweet ( no matter... More »
